mapper.insert:
insert into ex_order_info (orderNum, coinCode, fixPriceType,fixPriceCoinCode, transactionPrice, transactionCount, transactionSum, transactionTime, buyCustomId,buyEntrustNum,transactionBuyFee, buyUserCode, transactionBuyFeeRate,buyUserName, sellCustomId,sellEntrustNum,transactionSellFeeRate,transactionSellFee,sellUserCode,sellUserName,type ) values
( #{exOrderInfo.orderNum}, #{exOrderInfo.coinCode}, #{exOrderInfo.fixPriceType}, #{exOrderInfo.fixPriceCoinCode},
#{exOrderInfo.transactionPrice}, #{exOrderInfo.transactionCount}, #{exOrderInfo.transactionSum}, #{exOrderInfo.transactionTime},
#{exOrderInfo.buyCustomId}, #{exOrderInfo.buyEntrustNum}, #{exOrderInfo.transactionBuyFee}, #{exOrderInfo.buyUserCode}, #{exOrderInfo.transactionBuyFeeRate}, #{exOrderInfo.buyUserName},
#{exOrderInfo.sellCustomId}, #{exOrderInfo.sellEntrustNum}, #{exOrderInfo.transactionSellFeeRate}, #{exOrderInfo.transactionSellFee}, #{exOrderInfo.sellUserCode}, #{exOrderInfo.sellUserName}, #{exOrderInfo.type} )
mapper.select:
select * from (select * from ex_order_info a where
a.coinCode=#{coinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.fixPriceCoinCode=#{fixPriceCoinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.transactionTime desc limit 0,#{count} ) as b ORDER BY transactionTime asc
